Edited September 29, 2014 by xxjetterxx
Interesting concept. I once thought of a solar panel that was actually just a leaf. Looks pretty cool.

I like it! Can you make more of your more organic parts? I think a space-ship that is completely organic would be a great craft! (Also, I would love to use these in my AAR, so an organic-looking docking port would be REALLY cool, and organic parts to make a spaceship would also be AWESOME)
I'm about to make some new, more modular parts right now. I'm thinking tentacles.

I'm about to make some new, more modular parts right now. I'm thinking tentacles.

Tentacle ENGINES! Also landing legs. Imagine a life-form, adapted to living in space!
Sadly, I have absolutely no clue of how to animate. Once I nail that down, I may be able to have squirmy tentacles!
How did you make the sub hover?
I just used a slightly bigger collider than the model.

I just used a slightly bigger collider than the model.

Tell Snjo how you did it- he has been trying to make a working hovercraft part for a while.

Tell Snjo how you did it- he has been trying to make a working hovercraft part for a while.

Well, Snjo wants it to actually be a hovercraft powered by engines. The sub here is actually lying on the ground, it just doesn't look like it.

Interesting concept. I once thought of a solar panel that was actually just a leaf. Looks pretty cool.

That woudl be awesome.

Tentacles! Organic parts! Blue lights! Sturdy! Hovering! Submarines! Who needs anything else to be happy?

I download it right now!
I digg the organic feel of the parts, made me think of an ancient kerbal race who is long forgotten
These are seriously cool. Very Cthulhian. I have visions of massive ancient interplanetary tentacle monsters! If alien races are ever implemented in KSP they will invade in these XD

Guys, I'm really appreciating this support

Thanks for keeping my working on this!
Update-bump
The New Shuttle-part looks like an organ.
Notice the way it's engines produce a heartbeat sound
I like it. Very organic and fun looking.
Live for the swarm

The back story to where these parts came from should be that the kraken fell from the sky, and the kerbal scientists cut him up and found out how he worked. They then proceeded to combine him with their existing technologies, and thus the organic parts were born.
as much of a necro that is, thank you for the idea

Usually weird lookin' means fugly as all hell around these parts but these look very nice. Throw them at some other mods that allow for (pseudo)multiplayer, automation (e.g. kOS), craft staying loaded / simulatied at large distances and you've got some NPCs.
Love the blue glow. How'd you do that?

I want this mod,but downloding link dosn't work

Somebody have a copy of this add-on?

merged consecutive posts
